skills.name: The Ultimate Snowball
skills.description: Ullr instantly freezes the nearest enemy into a giant snowball, charges up, and then delivers a powerful charged attack, dealing DMG equal to 500% of his ATK and launching them 10 meters away.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG of Charged Attack to 520% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Targets launched will be stunned for 2s upon landing.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG of Charged Attack to 550% ATK.

skills.name: Shackle of Pain
skills.description: Shackles the nearest enemy with chains, then deals DMG equal to 100% of ATK to them 4 times.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per instance to 110% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Restores 20% of max HP if the target is defeated while the skill is active.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per instance to 120% ATK.

skills.name: Absolute Zero
skills.description: Ullr creates a Frost Chain with the nearest backline ally for the entire battle. 10% of the DMG taken by the linked unit is redirected to Ullr. When the ally's HP falls below 30%, Ullr instantly blinks in front of them, encasing them in a snowball for 3s and restoring HP equal to 250% of his ATK to them per sec. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 300% ATK per sec.
upgrades.level4: 20% of the DMG taken by linked units is redirected to Ullr.

skills.name: Bloodstained Bond
skills.description: Every 15s, Ullr consumes 20% of his current HP to grant himself a shield equal to 25% of his max HP for 10s.

upgrades.level2: Shield Strength increases to 30% of max HP.
upgrades.level3: Restores 5% of max HP per sec when the shield is active.
upgrades.level4: Shield Strength increases to 35% of max HP.

relic.name: Deadly Thrill
relic.description: Reduces Shackle of Pain's CD from 15s to 10s.

upgrades.level2: Shackle of Pain redirects 20% DMG taken to restrained enemies.
upgrades.level3: Reduces Shackle of Pain's CD to 7s.
upgrades.level4: Shackle of Pain redirects 40% DMG taken to restrained enemies.
